password.description: the biz user password for login

first_name.description: the first name of biz user

last_name.description: the last name of biz user

phone_num.description: the mobile number of biz user

userId.description: unique identifier for this biz user

accessToken.description: access token use for call api  created by web server

bizId.description: the business id of the biz user ,if it is exist

deviceToken.description: Biz user mobile device info for login

success.description: True is add success ,false is add failure

cashOnly.description: If case is payment only or not

reservations.description: If reservation is supplied only or not

wifi.description: The business have wifi or not

parking.description: The business have free parking or not

seatOutDoor.description: The business have seat out door or not

privateRoom.description: The business have private room or not

points_balance.description: customer the balance of point balance

flag.description: the biz image flag ,1 is default
